reversing_state.h
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #include "unicorn/state.h"
2 
3 /* State description:
4  The reversing state is instansiated when the robot has aligned itself perpendicular to the refuse bin
5  1. Reverse towards the bin until the rear lidar distance is less or equal to 10 cm
6  2. Exit state with new state set to LIFTING
7  2 alt. if abort message was recieved exit with new state set to IDLE
8 */
9 
10 class REVERSINGState : public State
11 {
12 public:
